bike.description: 100% Cr-Mo frame, monocoque "Hemi" top tube, w/ internal brake cable routing tube, internally relieved 40mm head tube, double butted down tube, Wrap gusset BB yoke, Tube seat-stay bridge, 6mm drop-outs
bike.paint_description: Two Tone Gloss Black/Pearl White, Gloss Hemi Orange/Pearl White
